acaps_measure: Amendments to funeral and burial regulations
acaps_comments: Family members of deceased covid-19 infected persons are advised to conduct burial according to strict protocol guided by health care professionals. They are also informed not to bring remains to ancestral homes for burial in order to protect family members from the disease. | | | | non compliance: Not applicable

acaps_comments: Both public and private businesses shall observe a strict 8 hour work day from 9:00-17:00 with two weeks in two weeks out of 50% of the workforce to ensure social distancing. | | | targeted pop group: checked | non compliance: Not available
